channel.title: Emotes? How to change names and what they do?
channel.description:
can someone please help teach me how to change emote names, and what they do?
forexample, making one emote called "Train" and bringing you to dummies?
Thanks@!!!

item.title: Emotes? How to change names and what they do?
item.dc:creator: @iownhard56 iownhard56
item.description:
@iownhard56 wrote:

I only know the emotes names…

First get the name you want to change… for example “house” and it was in red

Go in to client.java and press crtl+F

Then type in, @red@house or whatever word your trying to change

then after you change it save the file then compile it.

Read full topic
